field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ID# - Vote result ID #TIME# - Time of vote #VOTE_TITLE# - Poll name #VOTE_DESCRIPTION# - Poll description #VOTE_ID# - Poll ID #CHANNEL# - Poll group name #CHANNEL_ID# - Poll group ID #VOTER_ID# - Voter's user ID #USER_NAME# - User full name #LOGIN# - login #USER_ID# - User ID #STAT_GUEST_ID# - Visitor ID in web analytics module #SESSION_ID# - Session ID in web analytics module #IP# - IP address #VOTE_STATISTIC# - Summary statistics of this poll type ( - Question - Answer) #URL# - Poll URL
